sect2.title: Introduction to libtiff
sect2.para: The libtiff package contains the tiff libraries and associated utilities. The libraries are used by many programs for reading and writing tiff files and the utilities are useful for general work with tiff files.

sect2.title: Installation of libtiff
sect2.para: If you wish to allow the creation of compressed TIFF images, download the LZW Compression Kit and copy the provided tif_lzw.c file to the libtiff subdirectory of the libtiff source tree.
Install libtiff by running the following commands:

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --noninteractive: This switch is used to avoid the configuration routine asking for confirmation of the installation directories (which is passed to configure).
--with-DIR_MAN=/usr/share/man: This is used because even though --prefix=/usr is specified, the configure routine tries to install the man pages in /usr/local/man instead of the correct place.
--with-ZIP=yes --with-DIR_GZLIB=/usr/lib: This enables support for the handling of TIFF images with deflate-encoded data.
--with-JPEG=yes --with-DIR_JPEGLIB=/usr/lib: Use these switches to enable support for the handling of TIFF images with JPEG-encoded data.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libtiff package contains fax2ps, fax2tiff, gif2tiff, pal2rgb, ppm2tiff, ras2tiff, raw2tiff, rgb2ycbcr, thumbnail, tiff2bw, tiff2pdf, tiff2ps, tiff2rgba, tiffcmp, tiffcp, tiffdither, tiffdump, tiffinfo, tiffmedian, tiffset, tiffsplit and libtiff libraries.

sect3.title: fax2ps
sect3.para: fac2ps converts a TIFF facsimile to compressed PostScript file.

sect3.title: fax2tiff
sect3.para: fax2tiff creates a TIFF Class F fax file from raw fax data.

sect3.title: gif2tiff
sect3.para: gif2tiff creates a TIFF file from a GIF87 format image file.

sect3.title: pal2rgb
sect3.para: pal2rgb converts a palette color TIFF image to a full color image.

sect3.title: ppm2tiff
sect3.para: ppm2tiff creates a TIFF file from a PPM image file.

sect3.title: ras2tiff
sect3.para: ras2tiff creates a TIFF file from a Sun rasterfile.

sect3.title: raw2tiff
sect3.para: raw2tiff converts a raw byte sequence into TIFF.

sect3.title: rgb2ycbcr
sect3.para: rgb2ycbcr converts non-YCbCr TIFF images to a YCbCr TIFF image.

sect3.title: thumbnail
sect3.para: thumbnail creates a TIFF file with thumbnail images.

sect3.title: tiff2bw
sect3.para: tiff2bw converts a color TIFF image to grayscale.

sect3.title: tiff2pdf
sect3.para: tiff2pdf converts a TIFF image to a PDF document.

sect3.title: tiff2ps
sect3.para: tiff2ps converts a TIFF image to a PostScript file.

sect3.title: tiff2rgba
sect3.para: tiff2rgba converts a wide variety of TIFF images into an RGBA TIFF image.

sect3.title: tiffcmp
sect3.para: tiffcmp compares two TIFF files.

sect3.title: tiffcp
sect3.para: tiffcp copies (and possibly converts) a TIFF file.

sect3.title: tiffdither
sect3.para: tiffdither converts a grayscale image to bilevel using dithering.

sect3.title: tiffdump
sect3.para: tiffdump prints verbatim information about TIFF files.

sect3.title: tiffinfo
sect3.para: tiffinfo prints information about TIFF files.

sect3.title: tiffmedian
sect3.para: tiffmedian applies the median cut algorithm to data in a TIFF file.

sect3.title: tiffsplit
sect3.para: tiffsplit splits a multi-image TIFF into single-image TIFF files.

sect3.title: tiff libraries
sect3.para: The tiff libraries are used by many programs to read and write tiff files.
